Believers evidences for eternall life collected out of the first epistle of John which is catholique : explained and confirmed by very many subservient signes, or undernotes grounded upon Scriptures and illustrated by testimonies both of ancient fathers and modern writers whereby persons truly regenerate may divers wayes discover their present state of grace and title unto glory / by Francis Roberts. Roberts, Francis, 1609-1675.
The second impression.
32, 240, p., 2 folded leaves.
Printed by T.R. and E.M. for George Calvert ..., London : 1655.
Includes index. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======
